PatchOp.name: PatchOp

Assign.name: Assign
Assign.docstring: Set the value. Supersedes all other ops.

Clear.name: Clear
Clear.docstring: Set to the intrinsic default (which might be 'unset').

EnsureUnion.name: EnsureUnion

EnsureStruct.name: EnsureStruct
EnsureStruct.docstring:
* A pair-wise ensure operation.
 *
 * For maps this is an "add if key not present".
 *
 * For structs, this can be use to encodes the default state of the fields, based
 * on thier qualifier type:
 * - optional: absent
 * - terse: intrinsic default
 * - fill: custom default
*

PatchAfter.name: PatchAfter
PatchAfter.docstring: Apply a field/value-wise patch after all other ops.

Remove.name: Remove
Remove.docstring:
Remove if present.

A key/value-based remove for set/list, 'saturating subtract' for
numeric/'counting' types, and 'remove by key' for maps.

Add.name: Add
Add.docstring:
Add/prepend a value,with the following semantics:
- Key/value-based 'add' for set;
- 'prepend' for list, string, or binary; and
- saturating 'add' for numeric/counting types.

Put.name: Put

PatchOp.docstring:
The meaning of the patch op field ids, in all properly formulated patch
definitions.

Patch field ids are interpreted at runtime, as a dynamic patch protocol,
without any additional schema derived from IDL patch definitions.

GeneratePatch.name: GeneratePatch
GeneratePatch.docstring:
An annotation that indicates a patch representation
should be generated for the associated definition.

BoolPatch.name: BoolPatch
BoolPatch.docstring: A patch for a boolean value.

assign.name: assign
assign.docstring:
Assign to a given value.

If set, all other patch operations are ignored.

invert.name: invert
invert.docstring: If the bool value should be inverted.

BytePatch.name: BytePatch
BytePatch.docstring: A patch for an 8-bit integer value.

If set, all other patch operations are ignored.

I16Patch.docstring: A patch for a 16-bit integer value.

I64Patch.docstring: A patch for a 64-bit integer value.

FloatPatch.docstring: A patch for a 32-bit floating point value.

DoublePatch.name: DoublePatch
DoublePatch.docstring: A patch for an 64-bit floating point value.

StringPatch.docstring: A patch for a string value.

BinaryPatch.name: BinaryPatch
BinaryPatch.docstring: A patch for a binary value.

clear.name: clear
clear.docstring: Clears any set value. Applies first.

patchPrior.name: patchPrior
patchPrior.docstring: Patches any previously set values. Applies second.

ensure.name: ensure
ensure.docstring: Assigns the value, if not already set to the same field. Applies third.

patch.name: patch
patch.docstring: Patches any set value, including newly set values. Applies last.
